sentence: Just In... Few politicians have drawn as much ire from opposite corners of the political spectrum as Brian Kemp, the forever embattled Georgia governor seeking a second term in office this year.
author: Haisten Willis
title: The many trials of Brian Kemp

sentence: Abrams finally lost the election to the current incumbent, Brian Kemp, but specifically refused to concede.
author: David Freddoso
title: Poll: Stacey Abrams on pace to be reelected as the not-governor of Georgia

sentence: Right to his point, Purdue said at the Trump rally on Saturday, "In the state of Georgia, thanks to Brian Kemp, our elections in 2020 were absolutely stolen, yeah!"
author: Salena Zito
title: Why Georgia Gov. Kemp Tops the Polls Despite Trump's Bid to Take Him Down
